S03n239:1: satyaparibhāvitāṃ vācamagnirapi na prasahate laṅghayitumiti satyavacane'bhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
S03n239:4: sa katipayarātrodbhinnāṇḍakośaḥ pravirokṣyamāṇataruṇapakṣaḥ paridurbalatvādalakṣyamāṇāṅgapratyaṅgapradeśaḥ svamātāpitṛprayatnaracite tṛṇagahanopagūḍhe gulmalatāsaṃniśrite nīḍe saṃbahulairbhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ prativasati sma |
S03n239:7: tasya tayā rūkṣālpāhāratayā na kāyaḥ puṣṭimupayayau |
S03n239:9: itare tu vartakāpotakā yathopanītamāhāramabhyavaharanto balavantaḥ sañjātapakṣāśca babhūvuḥ |
S03n239:19: teṣāmevamavasthānāṃ nātidūre mahānvanadāvaḥ pratibhayaprasaktaninado vijṛmbhamāṇadhūmarāśirvikīryamāṇajvālāvalīlolavisphuliṅgaḥ santrāsano vanacarāṇāmanayo vanagahanānāṃ prādurabhavat |
S03n239:25: dhūmaughamagnaṃ paṭuvahniśabdaṃ vanaṃ tadārtyeva bhṛśaṃ rarāsa ||6 ||
S03n239:26: krameṇa cotpīḍyamāna iva sa vahniḥ paṭunā mārutena tṛṇagahanānusārī teṣāṃ nīḍasamīpamupajagāma |
S03n239:27: atha te vartakāpotakā bhayavirasavyākulavirāvāḥ parasparanirapekṣāḥ sahasā samutpetuḥ |
S03n239:29: viditātmaprabhāvastvasaṃbhrānta eva sa mahāsattvaḥ sarabhasamivopasarpantamagniṃ sānunayamityuvāca-
S03n239:36: nadīmiva prāpya vivṛddhatoyāṃ tadvācamāsādya śaśāma sadyaḥ ||8 ||
S03n239:46: tadevaṃ satyavacanaparibhāvitāṃ vācamagnirapi na prasahate laṅghayitumiti satyavacane'bhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
